Html:
Hi guys,

I've read all the documentation and used to have Rawr working several months ago.  I am using Mono version 2.2 and still get errors where Rawr will not run.

This is the error I'm getting:

"Unknown target convertion type from System.Boolean to Systems.Windows.Forms.CheckState

at System.Convert.ToType (System.Object value, System.Type conversionType, IFormatProvider provider)[0x00000]
at System.Convert.ChangeType (System.Object value, System.Type conversionType)[0x00000]
at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.ConvertData(System.Object data, System.Type data_type)[0x00000]

at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormData(System.Object data)[0x00000]
at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.PushData(Boolean force)[0x00000]

Is anyone else on OSX having this issue as well?  I have tried earlier versions of Mono and still no dice.  Rawr USED to work for me and then around 5 versions ago or so it stopped.

Thanks!
I've got a late 2008 MacBook Pro model.  The error happens when I start Rawr, the splash screen opens and then the error pops up directly behind it.

Hi,

I get the same bug (it seems) when using the mage module and when I try to modify the encounters options.

When RAWR starts on the druid module I can see the options from the "option" tab, options that define an encounter.

When I'm in the mage module (even a brand new one) and try to access the "option" tab the software crashes with this error :

 

  • System.InvalidCastException: Unknown target convertion type from System.Boolean to System.Windows.Forms.CheckState
  •   at System.Convert.ToType (System.Object value, System.Type conversionType, IFormatProvider provider) [0x00000] 
  •   at System.Convert.ChangeType (System.Object value, System.Type conversionType) [0x00000] 
  •   at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.ConvertData (System.Object data, System.Type data_type) [0x00000] 
  •   at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormatData (System.Object data) [0x00000] 
  •   at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.PushData (Boolean force) [0x00000]

 

System.InvalidCastException: Unknown target convertion type from System.Boolean to System.Windows.Forms.CheckState
  at System.Convert.ToType (System.Object value, System.Type conversionType, IFormatProvider provider) [0x00000] 
  at System.Convert.ChangeType (System.Object value, System.Type conversionType) [0x00000] 
  at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.ConvertData (System.Object data, System.Type data_type) [0x00000] 
  at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.FormatData (System.Object data) [0x00000] 
  at System.Windows.Forms.Binding.PushData (Boolean force) [0x00000]

 

Others function seems to work although it's quite a shame not to know for what kind of encounter we're optimizing.

 

I'm using a MacBook Pro, OS 10.5.8

 

Also I was wondering if there was a way to beta test the native version described at one moment on the home page of the project?

Hi,

would just like to add that i'm getting the same error as these guys macbook pro os 10.5.8, is there any fix?

 

I would also be very keen to beta test any native version you have for mac.

 

Thanks alot for the great program.

I've set a Issue Tracker item (#13902) to see the evolution of this bug.

Report it there in order to maintain it open.
